name: change_device_properties_immediately
description: Changes traits of smart home devices and returns status of those changes.

device_identifiers_to_modify.description: Unique identifiers of smart home devices.

property_names_to_change.description: Name of the trait to change.

commands_to_execute.description: Name of the command. Valid values for command_names depend on trait_name.

values_for_commands.description: New value of the command_name. Valid values for command_values depend on command_name. Default is None.

name: create_automation_script
description: Generates a home automation script via the Home Agent, and returns the response.

user_automation_request.description: The query to pass to the Home Agent Bard Service

applicable_home_name.description: The home name which the query applies to

name: execute_general_operation
description: Runs a general operation on smart home devices and returns the status.

devices_to_operate_on.description: Unique identifiers of smart home devices.

operation_to_perform.description: Name of the operation to run.

operation_parameters.description: Optional list of values for the operation.

op_execution_time.description: Time to execute the operation, expected in the format of "HH:MM:SS"

op_execution_date.description: Date to execute the operation, expected in the format of "YYYY-MM-DD"

op_time_period_specifier.description: Whether time_of_day is AM or PM or UNKNOWN

op_execution_delay.description: How long to wait before executing the operation. Example format are 5s, 20m, 1h

op_duration.description: How long the operation should last. Example format are 5s, 20m, 1h

name: fetch_device_status
description:
retrieves the state of devices in the user's home, such as the current temperature,

the current volume, or the current status of a light.

target_device_list.description: Unique identifiers of smart home devices.

name: find_devices_by_properties
description: Retrieves smart home devices set up by the user relevant to the query.

required_traits.description:
Optional list of traits to filter for. If this is empty, all traits will
be allowed (no filter will be enforced).

report_dynamic_state.description: Whether to include the dynamic state of the devices.

name: generate_device_info_table
description: Retrieves smart home devices set up by the user.

show_current_device_state.description: Whether to include the dynamic state of the devices.

name: list_all_user_devices
description: Retrieves all smart home devices set up by the user.

trait_filter_hints.description:
Optional list of traits to filter for. If this is empty, all traits will
be allowed (no filter will be enforced).

type_filter_hints.description:
Optional list of device_types to filter for. If this is empty, all
device_types will be allowed (no filter will be enforced).

name: list_pending_device_actions
description: View scheduled actions of smart home devices and returns status of those changes.

devices_with_schedules.description: Unique identifiers of smart home devices.

name: query_home_activity_log
description: Queries the home agent for events in the given home, such as those gathered by camera perception.

event_search_query.description: The query to pass to the Home Agent Bard Service

home_to_search.description: The home name which the query applies to

name: remove_scheduled_actions
description: Cancel scheduled actions of smart home devices and returns status of those changes.

device_ids_for_cancellation.description: Unique identifiers of smart home devices.

name: schedule_device_state_change
description: Changes traits of smart home devices and returns status of those changes.

target_device_ids.description: Unique identifiers of smart home devices.

traits_to_change.description: Name of the trait to change.

action_commands.description: Name of the command. Valid values for command_names depend on trait_name.

new_action_values.description: New value of the command_name. Valid values for command_values depend on command_name.

name: search_for_relevant_devices
description: Retrieves smart home devices set up by the user relevant to the query.

trait_search_suggestions.description:
Optional list of traits to filter for. If this is empty, all traits will
be allowed (no filter will be enforced).

type_search_suggestions.description:
Optional list of device_types to filter for. If this is empty, all
device_types will be allowed (no filter will be enforced).

should_include_current_state.description: Whether to include the dynamic state of the devices.
